00033 LogicCalc::LogicCalc(string ekspresi,int mode,int size) :bil(size),operatorx(size){
00034         this->ekspresi = ekspresi;
00035         this->mode = mode;

00045 
00050 int LogicCalc::Calculate(){
00051         int hasil;
00052         if(mode == 1)
00053     {
00054                 hasil = CalculatePrefix();
00055         }
00056         else if(mode == 2)
00057         {
00058                 hasil = CalculateInfix();
00059         }
00060         else if(mode == 3)
00061         {
00062                 hasil = CalculatePostfix();
00063         }
00064         return hasil;
00065 }

00071 void LogicCalc::SmallCalculate(Stack<int> &bil,Stack<string> &operatorx)
00072 {
00073         int popbil1;
00074         int popbil2;
00075         string dumpoperator;
00076         int dumpbil;
00077         string popoperator = operatorx.getLastData();
00078         operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00079         if(popoperator == "~")
00080         {
00081                 if(!bil.isEmpty() && bil.getLastData() == -999)
00082                 {       
00083                         bil>>dumpbil; //Pop -999
00084                 }
00085                 else
00086                 {
00087                         bil<< -999; //counter untuk merubah bil masukan berikut nya menjadi negasi dari input
00088                 }
00089         }
00090         else if(popoperator == "&")
00091         {
00092                 popbil1 = bil.getLastData();
00093                 bil>>dumpbil;
00094                 popbil2 = bil.getLastData();
00095                 bil>>dumpbil;
00096                 if(popbil1 && popbil2)
00097                 {
00098                         bil<< 1;
00099                 }
00100                 else
00101                 {
00102                         bil<< 0;
00103                 }
00104         }
00105         else if(popoperator == "|")
00106         {
00107                 popbil1 = bil.getLastData();
00108                 bil>>dumpbil;
00109                 popbil2 = bil.getLastData();
00110                 bil>>dumpbil;
00111                 bool x = popbil1 | popbil2;
00112                 if(x==1)
00113                 {
00114                         bil<< 1;
00115                 }
00116                 else
00117                 {
00118                         bil<< 0;
00119                 }
00120                 operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00121         }
00122 }

00128 int LogicCalc::CalculateInfix(){

00130         int dumpbil;
00131         int hasil;

00136                 int isCompleteRead = 0;

00140                         if(bil.isEmpty())
00141                         {

00221         }
00222 
00223         if(operatorx.isEmpty())

00226                 {
00227                         SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00228 
00229                 }
00230         }
00231         hasil = bil.getLastData();
00232         return hasil;
00233         //End

00240 int LogicCalc::CalculatePrefix() {
00241     char buffer[15];
00242     int i, len, j;
00243     int op1, op2, x;
00244     Stack<int> s;
00245         int dumpint;
00246     len = ekspresi.length();
00247     j = 0;
00248     for(i=len-1; i>=0; i--){
00249         if(ekspresi[i]>='0' && ekspresi[i]<='9'){
00250             buffer[j++] = ekspresi[i];
00251         }
00252         else if(ekspresi[i]==' '){
00253             if(j>0){
00254 
00255                 buffer[j] = '\0';
00256                 x = atof(buffer);
00257                 s<<x;
00258                 j = 0;
00259             }
00260         }
00261         else if(ekspresi[i]=='+' || ekspresi[i]=='-' || ekspresi[i]=='*' || ekspresi[i]==':' || ekspresi[i]=='%' || ekspresi[i]=='/'){
00262             op1 = s.getLastData();
00263             s>>dumpint;
00264             op2 = s.getLastData();
00265             s>>dumpint;
00266             switch(ekspresi[i]){
00267                 case '+':
00268                     s<<op2 + op1;
00269                     break;
00270                 case '-':
00271                     s<<(op2 - op1);
00272                     break;
00273                 case '*':
00274                     s<<(op2 * op1);
00275                     break;
00276                 case ':':
00277                     s<<(op2 / op1);
00278                     break;
00279                 case '%': // di c++ nggak bisa int mod int
00280                     while (op2 >= op1) {
00281                         op2 = op2 - op1;
00282                     }
00283                     s<<(op2);
00284                     break;
00285                 case '/':
00286                     int div;
00287                     div = (int)floor(op2 / op1);
00288                     s<<(div);
00289                     break;
00290             }
00291         }
00292     }
00293     return s.getLastData();
00294 }

00300 int LogicCalc::CalculatePostfix() {
00301     char buffer[15];
00302     int i, len, j;
00303     int op1, op2, x;
00304     Stack<int> s;
00305     len = ekspresi.length();
00306     j = 0;
00307         int dumpint;
00308     for(i=0; i<len;i++){
00309 
00310         if(ekspresi[i]>='0' && ekspresi[i]<='9'){
00311             buffer[j++] = ekspresi[i];
00312         }
00313         else if(ekspresi[i]==' '){
00314             if(j>0){
00315                 buffer[j] = '\0';
00316                 x = atof(buffer);
00317                 s<<x;
00318                 j = 0;
00319             }
00320         }
00321         else if(ekspresi[i]=='+' || ekspresi[i]=='-' || ekspresi[i]=='*' || ekspresi[i]==':' || ekspresi[i]=='%' || ekspresi[i]=='/'){
00322             op1 = s.getLastData();
00323             s>>dumpint;
00324             op2 = s.getLastData();
00325             s>>dumpint;
00326             switch(ekspresi[i]){
00327                 case '+':
00328                     s<<(op2 + op1);
00329                     break;
00330                 case '-':
00331                     s<<(op2 - op1);
00332                     break;
00333                 case '*':
00334                     s<<(op2 * op1);
00335                     break;

00337                     s<<(op2 / op1);
00338                     break;
00339                 case '%': // di c++ nggak bisa int mod int
00340                     while (op2 >= op1) {
00341                         op2 = op2 - op1;
00342                     }
00343                     s<<(op2);
00344                     break;
00345                 case '/':
00346                     int div;
00347                     div = (int)floor(op2 / op1);
00348                     s<<(div);
00349                     break;
00350             }

00352     }
